availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Arthur Morris and Cynthia Morris. Married to Nancy M. Rulon Morris in Harrison County, Kentucky, on April 7, 1864. Father of John A. Morris. Resident of Harrison County in 1850. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 141B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 532.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cutland, p. 231B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film 000216889.
